ComicInfo.Title: Dead-Killer
ComicInfo.Summary: Joey resists leaving the city but he won't let Dan leave alone. Kirk is a member of a loosely organized faction that refuses to take the overall zombie threat seriously. They hunt down zombies for sport and set them on fire. Kirk and a few others decide to leave the Appalachians because they know that disaster awaits them in this group. Wayne and Albert find themselves forced to watch a family fall to the zombies, realizing they would only get themselves killed if they tried to help.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-30 15:16:01. [CVDB142881]
ComicInfo.Writer: Gary Reed, Kyle Garrett, Randall Thayer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Day, Mark Winfrey, Ron McCain, Vincent Locke, David Day, Dan Day, Dan Day, Mark Winfrey, Mark Winfrey, Ron McCain, Ron McCain, Vincent Locke
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan Day, Mark Winfrey, Ron McCain, Vincent Locke, David Day, Dan Day, Mark Winfrey, Ron McCain, Vincent Locke
